title: "Failed to Connect"
body:
[Failed to connect]
"Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game."

This popped yesterday after I dced from the game, then I couldn't reconnect back but this thing keep popping whenever I try to get back on.
I tried with tutorial & custom game as well same thing happening from yesterday's disconnection till today

I can log in into LoL client but I cannot connect to game whenever I start one. Please help me out ty.
[btw I use nbn - just in case that you may need what's my connection is...]

replies.body:
Hey there, 

What ISP are you with?

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=35JlH1HG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-31T12:33:24.493+0000)
>
> 
> There was an issue with one of the providers that many ISPs use to reach the League game servers (IX Australia), which happened earlier tonight - [thread here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/FErIFkEZ-march-31st-2016-server-issue).  As fallout from this issue it looks like some players are having lingering problems with their connections despite the root cause being fixed.
> 
> Depending on ISP this might have affected you - and it might possibly be a lingering issue as some players are seeing (depending on if your ISP took any actions to route around the problem provider).  I'd expect this to be resolved soon enough - but it might be worth getting in touch with them if the issues are continuing tomorrow.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

Hello, It just got fixed now dw
My isp is with some Korean company (3rd party) called "Hana Telecom"

+ Thx for trying to help me out though ty.
